events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team is excited to review your background and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your skills and job preferences.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the hiring process for the developer role.
We conducted an initial screening call to better understand your software development experience and cultural fit within our team.
Thank you for your prompt response and for sharing additional details about your previous projects and technical expertise.
We have scheduled your technical interview for next Tuesday, where you will discuss practical software engineering challenges with our team.
